title: AI takes over Australia’s job market, top fastest-growing roles reveal tech’s dominance in the workforce, check out the list
description: Australia's job market is booming with AI and technology roles. AI engineers are leading this growth. Chief Risk Officers and Directors of Artificial Intelligence are also in high demand. Experts state AI is now essential for leadership and daily work. Building AI literacy and acquiring new skills will secure future careers across all industries.

title: Emmer Capital CEO explains what could revive foreign investor interest in 2026
description: Manishi Raychaudhuri, Chief Executive Officer, Emmer Capital Partners, remains cautious on Indian IT stocks in the near term. He described the sector as a “classic AI loser”, noting that fears around artificial intelligence replacing traditional coding roles could outweigh any potential benefits for IT services companies over the next six to twelve months.

title: Track IT Services Growth in North America

title: Stocks slip from AI-driven record highs, currencies on the defensive
description: Emerging Asia shares declined for the first time in 2026 on Wednesday, after an artificial intelligence-led rally drove most benchmarks to record peaks, while currencies extended losses as the U.S. dollar held its gains ahead of key economic data.
